coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttackHead] Randomly select one of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Then, มอบ 1 Potency of the selected effect ในเทิร์นหน้า.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (5 times max)

[OnSucceedAttackHead] Randomly select one of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Then, มอบ 1 Potency of the selected effect ในเทิร์นหน้า.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (5 times max)
[EnemyKill] Randomly select one of the following effects: 1 [Breath] Count, [Charge] 1 ขั้น, 1 [Agility], 1 [AttackUp], or 1 [DefenseUp]. Then, มอบ the selected effect to 2 random allies ในเทิร์นหน้า

[OnSucceedAttack] Randomly select one of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Then, มอบ 1 Potency of the selected effect ในเทิร์นหน้า.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (7 times max)
[EnemyKill] Randomly select one of the following effects: 2 [Breath] Count, [Charge] 2 ขั้น, 2 [Agility], 2 [AttackUp], or 2 [DefenseUp]. Then, มอบ the selected effect to 2 random allies ในเทิร์นหน้า

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Fell Bullet​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] ได้รับ (highest Reson. + 1) [BoseProjektil] (สูงสุด 7)
- หาก it was an A-Reson., ได้รับ (highest Reson. +2) [BoseProjektil] instead
[BeforeAttack] ได้รับ 1 [Breath] ต่อทุกๆ [BoseProjektil] (สูงสุด 3)
[EndSkill] เสีย every [BoseProjektil]

coindescs.desc: +5% ความเสียหายเมื่อติดคริ ต่อทุกๆ [BoseProjektil] (สูงสุด 35%)
[CriticalTargetKill] หาก ยูนิทนี้ has the [Bullet] effect, ได้รับ 1 [Bullet] (2 times ต่อทุกๆ Encounter)

levelList.name: <line-height=120%>Asymmetrical Inertia​</line-height>
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] ได้รับ (highest Reson.) [Vibration] Count (สูงสุด 6, 20 ต่อทุกๆ turn)
- หาก the said Reson. was a Sloth Reson., trigger [Switch_Vibration]บน[Vibration]บนself into [VibrationSpring]

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count ไป 1
- When triggering [Vibration] Burst, มอบ 1 [AmberTakeDamageUp] ในเทิร์นนี้
- หาก the highest Reson. was a 4+ Sloth A-Reson., มอบ 1 [AmberTakeDamageUp] ในเทิร์นหน้าเป็นwell
